name: Colin Powell Game
description:
It is a 3D platformer where you do battle with a giant, bad-ass copy of the former US Secretary of State. It is available on the Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms.
This listing will be updated regularly. To claim the game on your website, follow the instructions below: Send an email to us with the title (ex: "Colin Powell Game: [Your Name]" or "Colin Powell Game: [Your Trophies]"). Include the game title, your name (if applicable), and details about your website. Include a brief description about what you are doing and your process for claiming the game. Post your Email Address below. For Game About Us, click on the image below to view any of our other games
